mapper.insert: insert into member(email, pwd, nick_name) values(#{email}, #{pwd}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: select * from member where email = #{email} and isDel = 'N'
mapper.update: update member set last_login = now() where email= #{email}
update member set nick_name = #{nickName} where email = #{email}
update member set pwd = #{pwd}, nick_name = #{nickName} where email = #{email}
update member set isDel = 'Y' where email = #{email}
